edu.rit.sha2

Class SHA512_224

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.rit.crst.Computation
      • edu.rit.crst.Function
        • edu.rit.sha2.SHA512Base
          • edu.rit.sha2.SHA512_224

  • public class SHA512_224
extends SHA512Base
    Class SHA512_224 implements the SHA-512/224 hash function with a 104-byte (832-bit) message. The SHA512_224 cryptographic function's input A is the first portion of the message (512 bits); input B is the second portion of the message (320 bits); output C is the digest (224 bits).

    Class SHA512_224 computes the digest of one 1024-bit block consisting of the message (832 bits) plus the padding (192 bits). The padding consists of one 1 bit, sixty-three 0 bits, and the message length (128 bits).
